Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2018
column14: This package came with 3 different colors that looked like different shades but when put on were very close in color. The picture above is the darkest shade which was way too dark for me. My daughter however, who is wearing it loved it! The color lasted the entire day. Through three meals and multiple drinks. I did put a matte gloss over it after about 5 hours. Went on smooth and felt good...not sticky. Took off with an oil based make up remover. If the colors were actually different this product would get 5 stars.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
column14: This is the account names girlfriend. I don't know what everyone is saying when they talk about this being long lasting. Maybe if you never eat, never drink, never get an itch, never sweat and always go heavy on the makeup setter it might be, but never wear it out to dinner where you might have to dab the corners of your mouth a couple of times. As soon as it gets even a tiny bit wet from a beverage or if you kiss someone, it'll immediately start wiping off.

column14: Got these yesterday and so excited to open it.the packaging was secured. And got to use it today to work apply the product at 5am and not its 9.15am and hasn't been faded drink coffee and water didn't even apply retouch and still looks amazing. Definitely needs to order more colors.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2018
column14: I really wanted to like these. The colors are ok, they all sort of look the same but what I hated the most is that it dries and cracks right off your lips. It is hard to explain but it turns kind of grainy and it just becomes tiny little particles which go on your teeth your face and even on your clothes. I was stained everywhere after wearing it. I think it stays on pretty much anywhere but your lips. The colors aren’t true to the picture, but the quality is what bothered me the most.

column14: the color in the description looks darker than they really are. the smell is a bit off, it did make my lips dried, and it also made my lips tear a bit, because of how dried it make them. would not get it again. honest review. sorry

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2018
column14: This is my first time trying matted lipstick, but it's not really a lipstick in the sense of its shape, but it is rather a matted lip gloss since it has a wand. This does not take away from the quality of it though because the formula is very smooth and goes on well (I had chapstick under all of them which is recommended). It was a little hard for me using a wand because my hand is not as steady so I prefer actual lipstick. The nicest looking picture is #3 Jinx (my favorite of the bunch), the next is #14 Berry Me, and lastly #13 Fwtish. The only issue I had was with #4 since it went on a little patchy and you can tell in the photo. I did not wear these all day, but I have a feeling they will last because they're pretty tough to get off. Be prepared to have some coconut oil or some other oil based makeup remover because that's what works best/fastest. As for the matted aspect they all dried very nicely (see #13, they all ended like that but the other 2 I took a little premature so it looks wet). Overall they don't have any overwhelming scents and I really enjoyed this as my first matted lip wear!
